com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class ScrollableComponent<T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ScrollableComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>, IScrollSize

    public abstract class ScrollableComponent<T extends IComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponentProxy<T>, IScrollSize
    A component that can scroll another component.

      • handleScroll

        public void handleScroll(Context context,
                         int diff)
        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Should be called by the parent when the mouse wheel is scrolled. The current height of the component should be set by this method via Context.setHeight(int).
        Specified by:
        handleScroll in interface IComponent
        Specified by:
        handleScroll in interface IComponentProxy<T extends IComponent>
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        diff - the amount by which the wheel was moved
